scripts.test: testcafe chrome tests -s takeOnFails = true --reporter list --disable-page caching
scripts.test:chrome: testcafe -c 5 chrome ./tests/passwordRecoveryTest.js -s takeOnFails = true --reporter list --disable-page caching
scripts.test:firefox: testcafe firefox ./tests/passwordRecoveryTest.js -s takeOnFails = true --reporter list --disable-page caching
